en.flexibleCancelation: {{name}} allows you to cancel your reservation free of charge
en.abilityToProvideMedicalCare: {{name}} is able to give basic care to your pet.
en.atHomeContinuously: {{name}} can be continuously at home during the day
en.atHomeExclusivity: {{name}} can accept only one owner pet(s) at the time
en.atHomeOnlyBringPet: {{name}} has all your pet will need at {{gender}} place
en.atHomeComeGetPet: {{name}} can pick up your pet at your home
en.atOwnerHomePlantsCare: {{name}} can take care of your plants in your absence
en.atOwnerHomeCurtains: {{name}} can open and close your shutters and ventilate your home
